canvasToShape(Point2D) - Method in class fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CShape
Converts a point relative to the canvas into a point relative to a shape (the origin of the coordinate system becomes the left upper point of this shape).
canvasToShapeRef(Point2D) - Method in class fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CShape
Converts a point relative to the canvas into a point relative to the bounding box of a shape shape (the origin of the coordinate system becomes the left upper point of this shape, a unit has the size of the bounding box of this shape).
